name: Syan's Dream
description:
The first game I ever made and I chose Godot to do it!

Help Syan find her way through this 3D puzzle game I crafted for the Great Autumn Game Jam 2021 (https://itch.io/jam/-great-harvest-game-jam-2021)

You can play with the keyboard (arrows, WASD, ZQSD) or a controller.

I hope you'll enjoy it =)

Tools used:
- Godot Engine
- Blender
- Krita

The music was one I bought a few years ago but the rest is self-made or open-source (scatter add-on in Godot).
